settings.title: Settings and Preferences
settings.description: Change your password, set the language and theme (light or dark), and view your account information.
settings.accountInfoDesc: Update your account details, such as phone number, email address, and more.
settings.darkModeDesc: Switch between dark and light display mode

security.title: Access and Security
security.description: Manage your account protection settings, password management, and connected devices
security.notificationsDesc: Choose what types of notifications you want to receive (email, push, etc.) and how often
security.devicesDesc: View and manage all devices that accessed your account
security.endSessionsDesc: Log out of active sessions on other devices
security.consentDesc: Adjust your preferences on data collection and usage by the platform
security.deactivateDesc: Learn how to deactivate your account
security.downloadDataDesc: Request a file with all the information stored about your account
security.visibilityDesc: Manage who can see your actions like applications, interactions, and profile updates
security.clearHistoryDesc: Delete records of views, applications, or searches on the platform
security.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently remove your account. This action will delete your data and platform history

help.title: Feedback, Help, and About
help.description: Send suggestions and opinions, access the help center, and learn more about the company
help.feedbackDesc: Share your ideas, suggestions, or report issues directly to our product team
help.supportCenterDesc: Access detailed articles and tutorials about features, flows, and best practices
help.contactSupportDesc: Open a support ticket or start a live chat for specific questions or to report issues
help.termsDesc: Read our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and other legal guidelines
help.aboutAppDesc: View the current version of the platform, last update date, and copyright information
help.aboutAzjobDesc: Learn more about the company, team, and the story behind azjob.info

notFound.title: We lost this page
notFound.description: We searched high and low but couldn’t find what you’re looking for.
notFound.subdescription: Let’s find a better place for you to go.

footer.term: By continuing with an account registered in Brazil, you agree to our Terms of Service and confirm that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy.

signPanel.title: Glad to have you back
signPanel.btnEmailAndPassword: Log in with Email and Password

sign.title: Sign In
sign.erroFillEmail: Email must be at least 5 characters.
sign.erroFillPassword: Password must be at least 5 characters.

step2.labelCode: Enter the 4-digit code sent to your email
step2.erroRequiredPinCode: Please enter the pin code sent to your email.

step3.erroFillPassword: Password must be at least 5 characters.

signup.title: Create a new account
signup.erroFillEmail: Email must be at least 5 characters.
signup.erroFillPassword: Password must be at least 5 characters.
signup.erroFillName: Name must be at least 5 characters.

ConfirmEmailValidateAccount.title: Confirm Email
ConfirmEmailValidateAccount.labelCode: Enter the 4-digit code sent to your email
ConfirmEmailValidateAccount.erroRequiredPinCode: Please enter the pin code sent to your email.
